title: Citi Mobile: Romania's First Internet Banking Application for Transactions on Smart Phone
summary: Bucharest – Citi Mobile is the first smart phone application in Romania that allows customers to access their Citibank Online account and transact using their current accounts. This provides enhanced convenience compared to physically going into the branch or even logging in from a home computer or making a phone call. With the launch of Citibank Romania's Mobile Application, busy and tech-savvy customers may now enjoy a superior smart-banking experience, anytime and anywhere.
tag-1: Citi Mobile: Romania's First Internet Banking Application for Transactions on Smart Phone
tag-3: Bucharest – Citi Mobile is the first smart phone application in Romania that allows customers to access their Citibank Online account and transact using their current accounts. This provides enhanced convenience compared to physically going into the branch or even logging in from a home computer or making a phone call. With the launch of Citibank Romania's Mobile Application, busy and tech-savvy customers may now enjoy a superior smart-banking experience, anytime and anywhere.
tag-4: Using Citi Mobile, customers are able to perform payments and transfers in LEI, EUR or USD between Citi current accounts and in LEI to other bank accounts. Customers may pay their bills and check their account summary and their transactions details and activities. They also may locate nearby ATMs and Citibank Romania branches through the location-based service.
tag-5: "Ingenuity is one of the key principles that guide the relationship we have with our clients at Citibank," Kumar Ramachandran, Citibank Consumer Cluster Head for Romania and Czech Republic, said. "This means we are constantly striving to enhance our clients' lives through innovations that harness the breadth and depth of our information, global network and world-class products. The newly launched Citi Mobile reconfirms our commitment to delivering ease and convenience to our customers, allowing them to leverage their most valuable asset: their own time."
tag-6: The application is downloadable for Apple, Blackberry, Android and Nokia smart-phone platforms, and it works in all telephone networks, as no special SIM card is required. For iPhone users, this application will be available for download from the Apple iTunes Store, while for Blackberry, Nokia and Android users, the application can be downloaded by simply sending a SMS with keyword "citi mobile" to 1724.
tag-7: Customers login using the existing Citibank Online user ID and password. There is no separate registration required to access Citi Mobile application.
tag-8: Further information on Citi Mobile functions and complete terms and conditions, as well as the list of mobile phone types that are compatible with Citi Mobile version, are available online at www.citibank.ro or through the CitiPhone service line 0800801040.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global financial services company, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Through Citicorp and Citi Holdings, Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management. Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com.
tag-10: Citibank Romania Citi has been present in Romania since 1996 and provides high-quality financial products and services to national and international companies, small and middle enterprises, the public sector, non-profit organizations and individuals. Additional information may be found at www.citibank.ro.
